com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor

Class FTdevicelistInfoNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor.FTdevicelistInfoNode

  • public final class FTdevicelistInfoNode
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents a FT_DEVICE_LIST_INFO_NODE structure.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

      • FTdevicelistInfoNode

        public FTdevicelistInfoNode(java.lang.String flags,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String locId,
                    java.lang.String serialNumber,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String ftHandle)

        Construct and allocates a new FTdevicelistInfoNode object with given details.

        Parameters:
        flags - flags for this device.
        type - device type.
        id - device ID.
        locId - location id of this device.
        serialNumber - serial number of this device.
        description - description of this device.
        ftHandle - handle for this device.

      • interpretFlags

        public java.lang.String[] interpretFlags()

        Interpret the flags of this device giving information about whether port is open or closed and is it enumerated as high speed or full speed usb device.

        Returns:
        Array of string with interpretation of this device flags field.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the flags hex string can not be converted into numerical representation.
